thread.title: The 15 Most Striking Faces We Captured At Fashion Week
thread.title_full: The 15 Most Striking Faces We Captured At Fashion Week

title: The 15 Most Striking Faces We Captured At Fashion Week

organizations.name: fashion week facebook  amazon india fashion week

text:
facebook 
Amazon India Fashion Week finally came to an end last night with a beautiful finale show featuring ace designers Tarun Tahiliani and Amit Agarwal. The four days were a mad house as fashion dripped everywhere from the shows to the streets. Bollywood stars dropped by, designers displayed their winning collections, gender fluidity was brought to the forefront, people wore what they wanted without any apprehensions, models almost tripped on runways, people danced to the live music, someone broke their heel and someone else lost their jacket ... Fashion Week was nuts, as always. While there's always a lot beauty surrounding us, this year, we bumped into a number of stunning faces; faces that had their own stories to tell. These were faces that stopped us in our tracks. From beautiful eye make-up to neon hair, from huge retro sunglasses to a face full of bindis , these ladies can't be missed. Don't worry, we're not ignoring the men. Look at our site to see the hottest men we spotted! Until then, scroll down and feel the sisterhood. 
Its amazing how just a mere face could say so much. Take a look:
